Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Lea Leonie Schnell at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Having worked for over 23 years, Lea Leonie Schnell brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Lea Leonie Schnell and Schneider tied the knot in 2011. They are proud parents of 3 children: Hinterleitner, Ilse and Beatrix.
Education Background:
Lea obtained her secondary school diploma from Gymnasium St. Gilgen in 1997.
She then attended University of Vienna, which she graduated in 2001.
She also pursued further higher education at Johannes Kepler University Linz, graduating in 2006.
Occupation History:
Lea Leonie Schnell is a seasoned professional with over 23 years of experience.
At Jumbo Shipping Austria, Lea Leonie Schnell held the position of Ship Broker from 2002 to 2004, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at Werner & Mertz GmbH in 2005, further expanding her skill set.
At Werner & Mertz GmbH, she worked as a Fleet Manager from 2010 to 2015, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
After 13 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Maritime Industry Leader at Werner & Mertz GmbH in 2016, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Currently, she serves as a Logistics Conglomerate Owner at Jumbo Shipping Austria, continuing to make meaningful contributions to the industry since 2019.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 390000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns townhouse in Baden bei Wien, where she resides. It is worth 1180000 EUR.


Following the passing of her , a successful Private Equity Manager, she received an inheritance of 1390000 EUR in , which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting her in achieving her financial goals.
